reviewText: I have been a fan of Mr. McKay's since I was ten.  Getting to see these shows again via the DVDs has brought back amazing memories of those days.  Surprisingly, I actually remembered some of the scenes from one of the shows after 57 years.  I am enjoying falling for the show and its star all over again.  I only wish I could find the other two sets of DVDs so I could see more of both.
Love the show. Watched it in the 50's. The nostalgia overrides the questionable picture or sound quality. (I have the 22-disc set). Watch on small screen setting.
Image quality couldn't be worst.  This item is a Fraud
the video was very patchy and poor quality unless touched up I could not recommend buying this product much dissapointment

Very poor quality. I do not suggest you buy this. What I DO suggest is that you go online and download the original "Adventures In Paradise" theme music and burn it to a disk. Then purchase Gardner McKay's "Journey Without A Map". While you read the book let the theme music repeat on your CD player. That's what I did and it was nice. It was fun. TV Theme Songs Of The Past I loved this series as much as anyone. Maybe that's why I can't stand watching it in the condition it's in. Journey Without A Map We can't turn time back, but we can reminisce.
Love the show - but some of the epidsodes are 'missing' sound.  Not too happy with that.
